Package client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Client Class, creates the Client and connects it to the Server when it's possible
